Description: This role is responsible for shaping, designing, and executing HR digital transformation solutions for one or more HR functions for service delivery and corporate services in line with strategic plans and vision. In addition, this role will be responsible for the establishment of a service delivery led engagement and partnership model for the HR digital team spanning Global Services (GS) and GSHR  ecosystems by leveraging GS and Enterprise digital and technology capabilities.The role will be accountable to drive the program governance to ensure successful deployment, adoption and value realization of digital transformation solutions for the HR function. Provide leadership, direction, coaching and feedback to and through subordinate team membersInternal and External partnerships·       Build strong partnership and collaboration within the service delivery and HR functions·       Establish partnership with internal and external digital partners to keep abreast of the future capabilities to realize the vision of the HR integrated digital roadmap·       Stay abreast of evolving business needs – voice of the customer, external benchmarks·       Represent digital team in the program/project core teams for GSHR priorities·       Partner with change, portfolio, and program managers through the transformation life cycleJob Details
